name: Kill or Get Killed in Space!!
name_original: Kill or Get Killed in Space!!
description:
Have fun playing Kill or Get Killed in Space!!!

Created by: WoodsGames Studios for University of Michigan Unity Game Development on Coursera

The game only contains a single level; however, it features the following advanced modifications from the template

1) Introduction of an animated asteroid hazard that spawns at random and moves in a random direction. Don't get hit by it!

2) Enemies are randomly spawned and are lethal when hitting the enemy itself, not just the projectiles.

3) Addition of a "Current Lives" indicator to the UI screen
